description:
New downloadable content (Lively Party Pack) is coming to Party Party Time 2!
Enjoy a mix of 10 all new competitive and co-op minigames!
Feel the life of the party!

The "Lively Party Pack" includes the following content:
10 New Minigames:
6 Competitive Games
- Perfect Sugoroku
- Grab the Cake
- Running Derby!
- Flag Race
- Ghost Crossing
- Survival Squash
4 Co-op Games
- Memorize and Place
- Catch the Big One!
- Ghostly Parade
- Spinning Ship
name: Lively Party Pack
